attributes.action: Get supermarket workers the COVID vaccine ASAP  class them as front line workers
attributes.additional_details: So the supermarket workers are protected ASAP . We have 1000’s customers every week and not being protected is frightening. We cannot wait for 6 months .to many of us having to isolate . And putting our families at risk when we go home and not being able to see our families. We need protection so we can protect our customers..
attributes.background: Class supermarket workers as key front line workers to get the COVID vaccination after the health care key workers and the vulnerable . We have been in this nightmare from beginning bringing food to the nation .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
